name: Great Lechia
startIntroPart1: Great King Krakus Gąsiorek, you succeeded in leading the ancient people who, for 2000 years without interruption, occupied the territory from Alsace to the Urals. Your civilization not only led in science, but also triumphed militarily; your ancestors defeated Alexander, and you crushed the Roman Empire.”
startIntroPart2: King Lech, will you restore your empire? Will you bring back the truth that has been fruitlessly hidden by the Vatican? Will you build a civilization that will endure for centuries?
declaringWar: The white bird pointed to you! Prepare to heart-extraction!
introduction: Slava! I am Krak Gasiorek, conqueror of Rome and Lord of all Slavians.
tradeRequest: Great Lechia  offers you this legendary proposition.

name: נפילים
startIntroPart1: שַׁמְּחֲזַי, forefather of the נפילים, you were not afraid to descend to the earth and build your own nation. You generously taught your people metallurgy, art, and magic; no nation was able to defeat your giants.
startIntroPart2: שַׁמְּחֲזַי will you descend to the earth again? Will you lead your nation to glory and divinity? Will you create a civilization?
declaringWar: You disgust me, prepare to war
attacked: The sons of Adam will know my wrath.
introduction: Welcome. I'm שַׁמְּחֲזַי, the most powerful and wisest of Angels
tradeRequest: נפילים  offers you this exceptional proposition.

name: Gnomes
startIntroPart1: Rumpelstiltskin, wise leader of the gnomes, you knew well that your kingdom had to hide from the eyes of the big people. By avoiding world politics, your kingdom excelled in industry and science.
startIntroPart2: Rumpelstiltskin, will you lead your hidden people to glory? Will you uncover the treasures of the earth? Will you create a civilization that will endure for centuries?”
declaringWar: Forgive me, but the safety of my people demands this. Our hammers will ring once more.
attacked: Ah... so it begins. We will defend our hidden halls with honor.
defeated: Even in loss, the forges of the gnomes never go cold. May your heart stay kind.
introduction: Greetings, friend. I am Rumpelstiltskin the Younger, humble keeper of the Invisible Kingdom.
neutralHello: Peace be upon you, wanderer of the surface.
hateHello: Even stone can grow weary of strife.
tradeRequest: Perhaps we can share what the earth has granted us. A fair trade is a lasting bridge.
uniques: [+1 Culture, +1 Science] per [5] population [in all cities] <when not at war>

name: Fingolia
startIntroPart1: Hatsune Miku, proud Empress of Finngolia, after the Korean–Finnish Hyperwar you managed to unite the Finns and create the first Khaganate of Fingolia. The Finns returned to the pedestal of history, and they had the predispositions for it, after years of living in extreme arctic conditions, only the most intelligent Finnish genes survived
startIntroPart2: Beloved Queen, will you remind the world of the glory of Fingolia? Will you once again lead your hyper-intelligent Finns? Will you build a horde that will withstand the test of time?
declaringWar: Gomenasai, but yourur wickedness ends here! The mighty fingolian hordes are already coming for your head!
introduction: Moshi Moshi. I'm Hatsune Miku, of Fingolia!
hateHello: What did you come for? Baka

name: Khemet
startIntroPart1: Africa is the cradle of humanity, and Africa is also the cradle of modern civilization. It was here that the Empire of Khemet was born, which laid the foundations for all other civilizations, and experienced its most magnificent era under the reign of the Black Cleopatra.
startIntroPart2: Queen of Lower and Upper Egypt, will you return to lead your people once again? Will you restore their Golden Age? Will Khemet once again become a source of inspiration for the whole world? Will you create a civilization?
declaringWar: Aight, I’m done playin’. I’m comin’ for you.
defeated: Aight then… that’s a wrap. Shiet.
introduction: Shiet! I’m Cleopatra of Khemet , one of the most beautiful black women in the world
tradeRequest: Khemet got an offer you might wanna look at.
uniques: [+5 Gold] [in all cities]  <during a Golden Age>
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [+50]% more Influence <during a Golden Age>

name: Neuschwabenland
startIntroPart1: Alfred Ritscher, great explorer of Antarctica, it was you who led the Kriegmarine in search of agartha, and although you didn't find it, you discovered many interesting artifacts. After the war, you exiled Hitler, and then, with the last people loyal to you, built colonies in Antarctica, where to this day your people put up Aryan resistance against the Jewish invaders.
startIntroPart2: Great Captain, will you restore the Aryan heritage hidden in this frozen land? Will you avenge Hitler? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Bereitet euch auf den Blitzkrieg vor! Sieg Heil!
defeated: Es ist die Schuld der Juden.
introduction: Moshi Moshi. I'm Hatsune Miku, of Fingolia!
tradeRequest: Lasst uns gemeinsam jüdische Märkte meiden!

name: Reptillian Hegemony
startIntroPart1: The lizard beings had always sought to enslave humanity, and almost every religion carried within it a myth of hatred toward the lizard folk. However, after the first nuclear war, the lizard-people retreated into the shadows, from where they secretly ruled. Their power grew especially strong during the reign of the fictional leader Mark Zuckenberg, who, through a global system of infiltration, seized control over the minds and bodies of the entire Western civilization.
startIntroPart2: Son of the great Dragon, jaws of Behemoth, will you enslave humanity once again? Will your inventions propel your race to glory? Will your civilization stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your sssstupid sssspecies will be exterminated, NOW.
defeated: I may not be on the map anymore, but I'm the one pulling the sssstrings...
introduction: Sssshalom, I am Mark Zuckerberg, not everyone can sssee my real face.
uniques: Gain an extra spy <upon entering the [Information era]>
